agentAbility.name: Execute
agentAbility.description: Reaper senses weakness and strikes hard: damage from his main gun, secondary gun, or ramming instantly destroys opponents. He can also load a clip of shells for deadlier critical damage, automatically reloaded after each kill.

primaryAttack.name: Single Shot
primaryAttack.description: Requires reload after each shot, most accurate when stationary.

tankAbilities.name: Suppressive Fire
tankAbilities.description: Utilize the dual .50 cal machine guns on top of the tank to slow down opponents. While active, the turret will automatically target the tracks of vehicles withing a cone-shaped area in front of the tank. As the player moves the turret, the machine guns adjust their aim, enabling semi-aimed suppressive fire while the main gun keeps firing.

tankAbilities.name: Charge
tankAbilities.description: Reaper's tank transforms into a powerful projectile that can be launched at enemies. Thanks to a special engine, his vehicle's power output is greatly increased, but its agility is sacrificed. This lets Reaper lock in his aim and propel his tank toward opponents. While active, the ability reduces damage taken from ramming and allows him to push enemy vehicles with ease.
